channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pro-Life Center Takes Its Fight Against Democrat Lawfare To The Supreme Court
item.description: 'It's our hope that our efforts will result in protection for pregnancy centers across the nation,' said First Choice Executive Director Aimee Huber.

item.title: Clinton Treasury Sec. Larry Summers Cozied Up To Epstein, And Likely The CCP
item.description: Summers sought advice from Jeffrey Epstein on pursuing an extramarital affair with a CCP-connected mentee, raises serious ethical concerns.

item.title: Here’s Why Gavin Newsom’s Race-Based Gerrymandering In CA Will Fail
item.description: 'It’s pretty blatant that they were using race when they drew up new districts to get rid of Republicans,' said Hans von Spakovsky.

item.title: Swastikas, nooses and Confederate flags designated Coast Guard ‘hate symbols’ after uproar
item.description: Acting Commandant of the Coast Guard Adm. Kevin Lunday said hate symbols including swastikas and nooses remain prohibited as the service clarifies its...

item.title: The stock market’s ‘fear gauge’ spiked to its highest level since Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’ tariffs caused a global selloff
item.description: Tech valuations, interest rates, and geopolitical risks are creating a "perfect storm" of uncertainty.

item.title: Is President Trump Thinking About Greenland Again?
item.description: Much-touted pharmaceutical deals could end up giving the president new leverage.

item.title: Trump removes hefty tariffs on coffee, other Brazilian agriculture products

item.title: Going Nuclear
item.description: The Trump administration is right to make nuclear power part of the U.S. energy solution.

item.title: Federal judges uphold several North Carolina U.S. House districts drawn by Republicans
item.description: Federal judges on Thursday upheld several U.S. House districts that North Carolina Republicans drew in 2023 that helped the GOP gain additional seats ...

item.title: Unearthed FEC records expose Katie Porter's hypocrisy after she fumes at 'new billionaire' joining race

item.title: Jeff Bezos’ most expensive investment is a $500 million custom superyacht that’s the largest in the world
item.description: The Amazon founder even paid an extra $75 million for another yacht to support his superyacht.

item.title: The Left Is Nowhere Near Letting Go Of Its Trans Obsession
item.description: The left's approach to defending transgenderism may fluctuate, but its loyalty is unshakeable.

item.title: Nuremberg in the Age of Lawfare
item.description: A warped history of justice, Tarantino-style.

item.title: Republicans get serious on housing crisis with high-profile conservative influencer leading the charge

item.title: The Tariffs Aren’t Helping
item.description: Donald Trump is a wholeheartedly pro-manufacturing president, and he’s definitely here to help — with a dizzying array of tariffs.

item.title: Mamdani struggles to explain how he'll fund free buses
item.description: Zohran Mamdani, who is slated to become New York City mayor, faces the practical question of how to secure funding to make bus rides free.

item.title: How Principal Financial’s new CEO brought AI religion to the C-suite, and then worked to upskill 20,000 employees
item.description: Principal Financial CEO Deanna Strable has made AI literacy a key focus across all levels of the company.

item.title: As ICE readies ‘Swamp Sweep,’ Mississippi pledges to aid — not block — federal crackdown
item.description: Operation "Swamp Sweep" to bring 250 border agents to Mississippi and Louisiana for two-month immigration crackdown targeting criminal aliens.

item.title: What to know about Trump's draft proposal to curtail state AI regulations
item.description: President Donald Trump is considering pressuring states to stop regulating artificial intelligence in a draft executive order obtained Thursday by The...

item.title: Federal judge orders release of 16 migrants detained in Idaho raid, citing due process violations
item.description: A federal judge has ordered the release of 16 people detained by immigration officials during an FBI-led raid at a rural Idaho racetrack last month.

item.title: Anti-Natalists At NYT Want You To Think IVF Is The Only Way To Have A Career
item.description: Establishing a norm of egg freezing and IVF will further entrench the view that marriage is a capstone in life, rather than a foundation.

item.title: Nvidia CEO says AI will actually make everyone a lot busier: ‘Everybody’s jobs will be different’
item.description: “I would say that there's every evidence that we will be more productive and yet still be busier because we have so many ideas,” Jensen Huang said.

item.title: France to probe Elon Musk’s Grok after it said Holocaust gas chambers were used for ‘disinfection’ against ‘typhus’ rather than murder
item.description: Earlier this year, Musk’s company took down posts from the chatbot that appeared to praise Adolf Hitler after complaints about antisemitic content.
